ygData.subject: Removing uris with session ids

Hi,

there's a badly planned web site which pushes all sorts of rubbish to
=
our archive while being crawled with Heritrix. The version is 1.6.0
out of =
the box (don't know if version number matters here)

In logs there are entr=
ies like these, for example. 

http://www.mattivanhanen.net/index.php?sivu=
=3Dmvmpvapa&PHPSESSID=3D94eedeccc2275891fd6bb0a8e386806c&l=3Dfi&l=3Dfi&l=3D=
fi&l=3Dse&l=3Dfi&l=3Dse&l=3Dfi&l=3Dse
http://www.mattivanhanen.net/index.ph=
p?sivu=3Dkirjakauppa&PHPSESSID=3D94eedeccc2275891fd6bb0a8e386806c&l=3Dfi&l=
=3Dfi&l=3Dse&l=3Dfi&l=3Dse&l=3Dfi&l=3Dse&l=3Dse

In the settings

pathologi=
cal path filter is enabled, with repetitions=3D3
(should be repetitions=3D2=
 in order to have an effect here)
and in uri-canonicalization-rules, Sessio=
nIDs =3D enabled

I thought that PHPSESSID is among the known session ids b=
y default?
